entry.content: æ€§èƒ½å·®å¼‚åˆ†æ åœ¨Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)æ–‡ç« çš„3.4ç« èŠ‚æˆ‘ä»¬æ¢³ç†äº†å¯¹IEEE802.11 DCFæœºåˆ¶çš„æ€§èƒ½æ¨å¯¼ã€‚é€šè¿‡æ¨å¯¼çš„ç»“è®ºæˆ‘ä»¬å‘ç°ä½¿ç”¨äº†RTS/CTSæœºåˆ¶ä¹‹åï¼Œç›¸æ¯”äºBasic Accessæ‰‹æ®µï¼Œé¥±å’Œååç‡çš„æ€§èƒ½æœ‰äº†å¤§å¹…åº¦çš„æ”¹è¿›ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼š é¥±å’Œååç‡ä¸èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡çš„å…³ç³» æ³¨æ„åˆ°åœ¨3.4.4ä¸­ç»™å‡ºçš„ä¸€èˆ¬å½¢å¼çš„é¥±å’Œååç‡å¯¹äºBasic Accessä»¥åŠRTS/CTSæœºåˆ¶æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·ã€‚ä¸¤ç§æœºåˆ¶çš„ä¸»è¦åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äº\(T_c\)å’Œ\(T_s\)çš„åŒºåˆ«ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š \(T_c\)å’Œ\(T_s\) è€ƒè™‘åˆ°ACK, RTS, CTSè¿™äº›åŒ…çš„ä½“ç§¯éå¸¸å°ï¼Œå› æ­¤Basic Accesså’ŒRTS/CTSæœºåˆ¶çš„åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äº\(T_s\)å’Œ\(T_c\)çš„ç›¸å¯¹å¤§å°ä¸åŒã€‚åœ¨Basic Accessä¸­ä¸¤ä¸ªå€¼éå¸¸æ¥è¿‘ï¼Œè€Œåœ¨RTS/CTSä¸­ä¸¤ä¸ªå€¼çš„å·®åˆ«éå¸¸å¤§ã€‚ \[\begin{equation} \label{1} S=\frac{P_sP_{tr}E[P]}{(1-P_{tr})\sigma+P_{tr}P_sT_s+P_{tr}(1-P_s)T_c} \end{equation}\] ä¸Šé¢çš„å¼å­ä¸­ï¼Œ\(P_{tr}P_s=n\tau (1-\tau)^{n-1}\)éšç€\(n\)å¢åŠ è€Œé€’å‡ã€‚\(P_{tr}\)éšç€\(n\)å¢åŠ è€Œè¶‹å‘äº1ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ†æ¯é¡¹ä¸­ï¼Œéšç€\(n\)å‡é«˜ï¼Œå‰ä¸¤é¡¹éƒ½è¶‹å‘äº0ï¼Œåä¸€ä¸ªè¶‹å‘äº\(T_c\)ã€‚å¯è§\(T_c\)çš„å€¼å†³å®šäº†æœ€åä¸‹é™çš„é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚ åˆ†æ¯çš„å½¢å¼å…¶å®å¾ˆç±»ä¼¼äºä¸¤çº§lerp functionï¼Œå³ä»å½¢çŠ¶ä¸Šæ¥çœ‹ï¼Œåˆ†æ¯çš„å–å€¼ä»\(\sigma\)å‡ºå‘ï¼Œé€æ¸é è¿‘\(T_s\)ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆæ”¶æ‹¢åˆ°\(T_c\)ã€‚ä¸‹å›¾æœ‰åŠ©äºç†è§£ï¼š ä¸Šå›¾å…¶å®æ˜¯bezieræ›²çº¿çš„åŸç†ç¤ºæ„å›¾ï¼Œå‡ºå¤„æ˜¯è´å¡å°”æ›²çº¿åŸç†ï¼ˆç®€å•é˜è¿°ï¼‰ æ··åˆæ€§èƒ½ è¿™é‡Œè¯´çš„æ··åˆæ€§èƒ½æ˜¯æŒ‡åŒæ—¶å­˜åœ¨Basic Accesså’ŒRTS/CTSçš„æƒ…å†µã€‚å…·ä½“çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœåŒ…çš„å¤§å°è¶…è¿‡äº†é˜ˆå€¼\(\overline{P}\)ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆé‡‡ç”¨RTS/CTSå‘é€ï¼Œå¦åˆ™åº”ç”¨Basic Accessè§„åˆ™ã€‚ è®°\(F(\cdot)\)ä¸ºåŒ…å¤§å°çš„ç´¯ç§¯æ¦‚ç‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ\(F(\overline{P})\)å°±ä¸ºBasic Accesså‘é€çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œ\(1-F(\overline{P})\)ä¸ºä½¿ç”¨RTS/CTSå‘é€çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚è®°: \[\begin{equation} O_{\mathrm{rts}}=T_{s}^{\mathrm{rts}}-T_{s}^{\mathrm{bas}}=\mathrm{RTS}+\mathrm{SIFS}+\delta+\mathrm{CTS}+\mathrm{SIFS}+\delta \end{equation}\] ä¸ºRTS/CTSéœ€è¦ä»˜å‡ºçš„é¢å¤–ä¼ è¾“å¼€é”€ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆå¾ˆå®¹æ˜“æœ‰: \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} T_{s} &=T_{s}(\overline{P})=T_{s}^{\mathrm{bas}} F(\overline{P})+T_{s}^{\mathrm{rts}}(1-F(\overline{P})) \\ &=T_{s}^{\mathrm{bas}}+O_{\mathrm{rts}}(1-F(\overline{P})) \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] ä¸ºäº†è¿›ä¸€æ­¥æ¨å¯¼ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åšä¸€å®šçš„ç®€åŒ–ï¼Œå¿½ç•¥æ‰è¶…è¿‡ä¸¤ä¸ªåŒ…å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œç¢°æ’çš„å¯èƒ½æƒ…å½¢å°±è¢«çº¦æŸåˆ°ä¸‹é¢çš„ä¸‰ä¸ªç±»åˆ«ï¼š ä¸¤ä¸ªRTSå¸§ç¢°æ’ï¼Œæ¦‚ç‡(æ¡ä»¶æ¦‚ç‡)ä¸º\((1-F(\overline{P}))^2\); ä¸¤ä¸ªæ™®é€šå¸§ï¼ˆBasic Accessï¼‰çš„ç¢°æ’ï¼Œæ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(F(\overline{P})^2\)ï¼› æ™®é€šå¸§å’ŒRTSä¹‹é—´çš„ç¢°æ’ è¿™æ¶‰åŠåˆ°ä¸‰ç§ä¸åŒçš„\(T_c\)ï¼š\(T^{rts/rts}\), \(T^{bas/bas}\), \(T_c^{bas/rts}\)ã€‚åŸºäºä¸Šé¢æ€»ç»“çš„æ¡ä»¶æ¦‚ç‡æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å¹³å‡ç¢°æ’æ—¶é—´å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} T_{c}(\overline{P})=&(1-F(\overline{P}))^{2} T_{c}^{\mathrm{rts} / \mathrm{rts}} \\ &+2 F(\overline{P})(1-F(\overline{P})) T_{c}^{\mathrm{rts} / \mathrm{bas}}+F^{2}(\overline{P}) T_{c}^{\mathrm{bas} / \mathrm{bas}} \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] è®°\(O_{h}=\left(T_{c}^{\mathrm{bas}}-P-T_{c}^{\mathrm{rts}}\right)=(H-\mathrm{RTS})\)ä¸ºæ•°æ®å¸§çš„Headerç›¸æ¯”äºRTSçš„é¢å¤–é•¿åº¦ã€‚\(\alpha=H+\mathrm{DIFS}+\delta\)ã€‚åœ¨WAVE: \(T_s\)å’Œ\(T_c\)çš„ç¡®å®šä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»è®¡ç®—å¾—åˆ°äº†ï¼š \[\begin{equation} T_{c}^{\mathrm{rts} / \mathrm{rts}}=\mathrm{RTS}+\mathrm{DIFS}+\delta=\alpha-O_{h} \end{equation}\] ä¸ºäº†è®¡ç®—RTSå¸§å’Œæ•°æ®å¸§çš„å†²çªæ—¶é—´ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘åˆ°RTSçš„å¤§å°æ€»æ˜¯å°äºæ•°æ®å¸§çš„å¤§å°ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸Šé¢æˆ‘ä»¬å®šä¹‰çš„\(O_h\)å§‹ç»ˆä¸ºæ­£å€¼ã€‚æ•…è¿™ä¸ªå¹³å‡å†²çªæ—¶é—´æ˜¯ç”±Basic Accesçš„æ•°æ®å¸§çš„å¹³å‡é•¿åº¦å†³å®šï¼Œä»è€Œæœ‰ï¼š \[\begin{equation} T_{c}^{\mathrm{rts} / \mathrm{bas}}=\alpha+\int_{0}^{\overline{P}}\left(1-\frac{F(x)}{F(\overline{P})}\right) d x \end{equation}\] æ­¤å¤„\(F(x) / F(\overline{P}), x \in(0, \overline{P})\)ä¸ºBasic Accesså‘é€æ—¶çš„åŒ…å¤§å°çš„æ¡ä»¶æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚æœ€åï¼Œå¯¹äºBasic Accessçš„æ•°æ®åŒ…ä¹‹é—´çš„å†²çªé—®é¢˜ï¼š \[\begin{equation} T_{c}^{\mathrm{bas} / \mathrm{bas}}=\alpha+\int_{0}^{\overline{P}}\left(1-\frac{F^{2}(x)}{F^{2}(\overline{P})}\right) d x \end{equation}\] æœ€ç»ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°æ•´ä½“çš„å¹³å‡å†²çªæ—¶é—´ä¸ºï¼š \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} T_{c}(\overline{P})=& \alpha-(1-F(\overline{P}))^{2} O_{h} \\ &+2 F(\overline{P})(1-F(\overline{P})) \int_{0}^{\overline{P}}\left(1-\frac{F(x)}{F(P)}\right) d x \\ &+F^{2}(\overline{P}) \int_{0}^{\overline{P}}\left(1-\frac{F^{2}(x)}{F^{2}(P)}\right) d x \end{aligned} \end{equation}\]

slot time}]} \] è®°åŒ…çš„å¹³å‡ä¼ è¾“æ—¶é—´æ˜¯\(E[P]\)ï¼Œä¿ºä¹ˆåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªslot timeé‡Œé¢ç”¨äºä¼ è¾“çš„å¹³å‡æ—¶é—´é•¿åº¦æ˜¯\(P_{tr}P_{s}E[P]\)ã€‚slot timeçš„å¹³å‡å¤§å°æ˜¯ \[ (1-P_{tr})\sigma+P_{tr}P_sT_s+P_{tr}(1-P_s)T_c \] å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\(T_s\)æ˜¯ä¿¡é“æ£€æµ‹ä¸ºç¹å¿™åçš„å¹³å‡slot timeé•¿åº¦ï¼ˆå…¶å†…éƒ¨åŒ…å«äº†ä¸€æ•´ä¸ªåŒ…ä¼ è¾“çš„æ—¶é—´ï¼‰ï¼Œ\(T_c\)ä¸ºä¿¡é“å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’ä»¥åè¢«è¯†åˆ«ä¸ºç¹å¿™çš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆ \[ S=\frac{P_sP_{tr}E[P]}{(1-P_{tr})\sigma+P_{tr}P_sT_s+P_{tr}(1-P_s)T_c} \] æ³¨æ„ä¸Šé¢çš„æ¨å¯¼è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æˆ‘ä»¬å…¶å®å¹¶æœªæŒ‡å®šç‰¹å®šçš„æ¥å…¥æœºåˆ¶ã€‚å¯¹äºç‰¹å®šçš„æ¥å…¥æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦ç¡®å®šä¸ä¹‹ç›¸å…³çš„\(T_s\)å’Œ\(T_c\)ã€‚ \(T_s\)å’Œ\(T_c\)çš„ç¡®å®š åªè€ƒè™‘å­˜åœ¨ACKæœºåˆ¶ä¸‹ï¼Œ \[ \left\{\begin{array}{l} T_{s}^{bas}=H+E[P]+SIFS+\delta+ACK+DIFS+\delta\\ T_c^{bas}=H+E[P^*] + DIFS +\delta \end{array}\right. \] å…¶ä¸­\(H=PHY_{hdr}+MAC_{hdr}\)ä¸ºç‰©ç†å±‚å’ŒMACå±‚çš„å¸§å¤´ä¼ è¾“æ—¶é—´ã€‚\(\delta\)æ˜¯ä¼ è¾“å»¶æ—¶ï¼Œ\(E[P^*]\)æ˜¯the average length of the longest packet payload involved in a collision. å¦‚æœæ‰€æœ‰çš„åŒ…çš„å¤§å°éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ\(E[P^*]=P\)ã€‚åœ¨æ›´ä¸€èˆ¬çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰åŒ…çš„å¤§å°å¯ä»¥è¢«è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹åŒåˆ†å¸ƒçš„ã€‚è®°è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†å¸ƒä¸º\(F(\cdot)\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \[ \begin{aligned} E[P^*] &=E[E[\max(P_1,\dots,P_k|k]]\\ &=\frac{\sum_{k=2}^{n}\left(\begin{array}{c}n\\k\end{array}\right)\tau^{k}(1-\tau)^{n-k}\int_{0}^{P_{max}}(1-F(x))^kdx}{1-(1-\tau)^n-n\tau(1-\tau)^{n-1}} \end{aligned} \] å¦‚æœå¿½ç•¥ä¸‰ä¸ªæˆ–è€…æ›´å¤šåŒ…ç¢°æ’çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸Šé¢çš„å¼å­å¯ä»¥ç®€åŒ–ä¸ºï¼š \[ E[P^*]=\int_0^{P_{max}}(1-F(x)^2)dx. \] \(T_c\)æ˜¯ç”±æœªå‚ä¸åˆ°ç¢°æ’ä¸­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹æ„ŸçŸ¥åˆ°çš„ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™æ—¶é—´ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¿½ç•¥äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªæˆ–è€…æ›´å¤šä¸ªçš„ç¢°æ’èŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨æ„ŸçŸ¥ä¿¡é“å‰éœ€è¦ç­‰å¾…ACKè¶…æ—¶è¿™ä¸ªå› ç´ ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å®é™…ä¸­çš„\(T_c\)è¦ä¸è¿™é‡Œç»™å‡ºçš„è®¡ç®—ç»“æœè¦å¤§ã€‚ å†è€ƒè™‘åœ¨RTS/CTSæœºåˆ¶ä¸‹ï¼š \[ \left\{ \begin{array}{l} T_s^{rts}=RTS+SIFS+\delta+CTS + SIFS + \delta + H + E[P] + SIFS + \delta+ACK+ DIFS + \delta \\ T_c^{rts} = RTS + DIFS + \delta \end{array} \right. \] å¯¹äºBeaconåŒ…çš„ç‰¹æ®Šåˆ†æ å¾ˆå¤šæ–‡çŒ®ä¸­å¯¹äºBeaconåŒ…çš„å‘é€è¿‡ç¨‹åšäº†ç®€åŒ–ï¼Œå³å‘é€è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­åªè¿›è¡Œä¸€è½®é€€é¿ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰é€€é¿çª—å£çš„æŒ‡æ•°å¢é•¿è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶BeaconåŒ…çš„å‘é€çŠ¶æ€æˆä¸ºä¸€ç»´é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚è¿™éƒ¨åˆ†é—®é¢˜å‚è§ï¼šWAVEæ ‡å‡†ä¸­çš„Beaconæ€§èƒ½ç®€åŒ–åˆ†æ ç»“æœåˆ†æ é¥±å’Œååç‡ä¸èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡çš„å…³ç³» ä»ä¸Šå›¾ä¸­æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å‘ç°ï¼Œå¯¹äºBasic Accessæ–¹å¼ï¼Œé¥±å’Œååç‡å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡å‘ˆè´Ÿç›¸å…³ï¼Œä¹Ÿå³å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹å¯†åº¦å‘ˆè´Ÿç›¸å…³ã€‚è¿™æ„å‘³ç€èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡è¶Šå°‘ï¼Œé¥±å’Œååç‡è¶Šé«˜ã€‚ç›¸åï¼Œå¯¹äºRTS/CTSæœºåˆ¶è€Œè¨€ï¼Œåœ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹å¯†åº¦è¾¾åˆ°ä¸€å®šçš„ç¨‹åº¦ä»¥åï¼Œé¥±å’Œååç‡å°±å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°é‡æ— å…³äº†ã€‚ è¿™ä¸ªæ€§èƒ½å·®å¼‚æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨IEEE802.11 DCFä¸­Basic Accesså’ŒRTS/CTSæœºåˆ¶çš„ç†è®ºé¥±å’Œååç‡æ€§èƒ½å·®å¼‚åˆ†æè¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ä¸­è¿›è¡Œäº†è¯¦ç»†çš„åˆ†æã€‚ Reference [1] G. messageä½¿ç”¨æœ€é«˜çš„ä¼˜å…ˆçº§AC3(å‚è§EDCA)ï¼Œå‘¨æœŸæ€§æ’­æŠ¥çš„çŠ¶æ€æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨AC0. å‡è®¾æ‰€æœ‰åŒ…çš„å¤§å°éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€è‡´çš„ï¼Œä¸º\(L\)æ¯”ç‰¹ã€‚ä¸ºäº†ç®€åŒ–åˆ†æå‡è®¾æ•´ä¸ªSIéƒ½ç”¨äºä¼ è¾“å®‰å…¨ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå³CCHI=SIã€‚æ¯è¾†è½¦ä¼šéšæœºé€‰æ‹©SIä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶éš™å‘é€çŠ¶æ€åŒ…ï¼Œwarning messageåˆ™éšç€äº‹ä»¶çš„å‘ç”Ÿéšæœºäº§ç”Ÿã€‚ å‡è®¾æ‰€æœ‰çš„è½¦è¾†å‘å°„åŠŸç‡éƒ½æ˜¯\(P_t\)ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¥æ”¶æ–¹æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè‹¥æ¥æ”¶åŠŸç‡è¾¾åˆ°äº†é—¨é™\(P_{th}\)å°±è®¤ä¸ºèƒ½å¤ŸæˆåŠŸåœ°æ”¶åˆ°æ•°æ®åŒ…ã€‚ç”±äºä¿¡é“è¡°å‡çš„éšæœºæ€§ï¼Œæ¥æ”¶åŠŸç‡ä¹Ÿä¼šæ˜¯éšæœºçš„ï¼Œè¿™æ„å‘³ç€é€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡ã€‚é€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´çš„ç´¯ç§¯æ¦‚ç‡å‡½æ•°(CDF)\(F_R(r)\)åŠå…¶æœŸæœ›\(E[R]\)ä¼šåœ¨åç»­è¿›è¡Œæ¨å¯¼ã€‚ å˜é‡ä»¥åŠç¼©ç•¥è¯­è¡¨ é€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´ ä¼ è¾“æ¨¡å‹ VANETçš„ä¿¡é“è¡°å‡åœ¨è¿‘è·ç¦»ä¸Šæœä»Ricianåˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œåœ¨é•¿è·ç¦»ä¸Šè¶‹è¿‘äºRayleighåˆ†å¸ƒã€‚é€šè¿‡ä½¿ç”¨Nakagamiåˆ†å¸ƒå¯ä»¥ç»¼åˆè¿™ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µã€‚Nakagamiæ¨¡å‹çš„æ¦‚ç‡å¯†åº¦å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆPDFï¼‰å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \label{1} P_{z^{2}}(x)=\left(\frac{m}{P_{r}}\right)^{m} \frac{x^{m-1}}{\Gamma(m)} e^{-\frac{m x}{P_{r}}}, \quad \text { for } x \geq 0 \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\(x\)ä¸ºæ¥æ”¶åˆ°çš„ä¿¡å·åŠŸç‡ï¼Œ\(\Gamma(\cdot)\)ä¸ºGammaå‡½æ•°ï¼Œ\(P_{r}=P_{t} K / r^{\alpha}\)ä¸ºå¹³å‡æ¥æ”¶åŠŸç‡ï¼Œ\(r\)ä¸ºé€šä¿¡è·ç¦»ï¼ˆç±³ï¼‰ï¼Œ\(\alpha\)ä¸ºè·¯å¾„è¡°å‡æŒ‡æ•°ã€‚\(K=G_{t} G_{r}\left(C /\left(4 \pi f_{c}\right)\right)^{2}\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­\(C\)ä¸ºå…‰é€Ÿï¼Œ\(f_c=5.9 \text{GHz}\)ä¸ºè½½æ³¢é¢‘ç‡ï¼Œ\(G_t\)å’Œ\(G_r\)åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºå‘é€è€…å’Œæ¥å—è€…çš„å¤©çº¿å¢ç›Šã€‚\(m\)ä¸ºè¡°å‡ç³»æ•°ã€‚ å½“\(m=1\)æ—¶ï¼ŒNakagamié€€åŒ–æˆRayleighåˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œå½“\(m=(k+1)^2/(2k+1)\)æ—¶ï¼ŒNakagamiåˆ†å¸ƒå¯ä»¥è¿‘ä¼¼ä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¸º\(k\)çš„Ricianåˆ†å¸ƒï¼ˆ\(k\) is the ratio of power in the line of sight to the power in the non-line of sightï¼‰ã€‚ é€šè¿‡\(\eqref{1}\)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å‡ºå½“æ¥æ”¶èƒ½é‡è¶…è¿‡\(P_{th}\)æ—¶ï¼Œé€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´çš„CDFï¼š \[\begin{equation} \label{2} F_{R}(r)=1-P\left(x \geq P_{th}\right)=1-\int_{P_{th}}^{\infty} P_{z^{2}}(x) d x \end{equation}\] å°†\(\eqref{1}\)ä»£å…¥åˆ°\(\eqref{2}\)ï¼Œå¹¶è®°\(u=(m x) / P_r\)ï¼ŒCDFå¯ä»¥å†™ä½œï¼š \[\begin{equation} \label{3} F_{R}(r)=1-\frac{1}{\Gamma(m)} \int_{\frac{m P_{\mathrm{th}}}{P_{r}}}^{\infty} u^{m-1} e^{-u} d u \end{equation}\] ä½¿ç”¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ç§¯åˆ†å˜æ¢ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \int x^{n} e^{c x} d x=\left(\frac{d}{d c}\right)^{n} \frac{e^{c x}}{c} \end{equation}\] CDFå¯ä»¥å†™æˆï¼š \[\begin{equation} \label{5} F_{R}(r)=1-\frac{1}{\Gamma(m)} \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} \frac{(m-1) !}{(m-1-i) !}\left(\frac{m P_{\mathrm{th}}}{P_{r}}\right)^{m-1-i} e^{-\frac{m P_{\mathrm{th}}}{P_{r}}} \end{equation}\] æœ‰äº†CDFä»¥åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—é€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´çš„å¹³å‡å€¼\(E[R]\)äº†ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} E[R]=\frac{1}{\alpha \Gamma(m)} \sum_{i=0}^{m-1} & \frac{(m-1) !}{(m-1-i) !} \\ & \times \Gamma\left(m-1-i+\frac{1}{\alpha}\right)\left(\frac{m P_{\mathrm{th}}}{P_{t} K}\right)^{-\frac{1}{\alpha}} \end{aligned} \label{6} \end{equation}\] ä¸Šé¢æ¨å¯¼çš„æ˜¯èƒ½å¤ŸæˆåŠŸé€šè®¯çš„èŒƒå›´ã€‚å¯¹äºè½½æ³¢ä¾¦å¬çš„èŒƒå›´\(E[L_{CS}]\)å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡\(\eqref{6}\)ç±»ä¼¼çš„è¿‡ç¨‹è¿›è¡Œæ¨å¯¼ã€‚è¿™é‡Œè½½æ³¢ä¾¦å¬èŒƒå›´æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯èŠ‚ç‚¹å¯ä»¥æ„ŸçŸ¥åˆ°åŒ…ï¼ˆä½†æ˜¯æœªå¿…èƒ½å¤ŸæˆåŠŸæ”¶åˆ°æ­¤åŒ…ï¼‰çš„èŒƒå›´ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬è®¤ä¸ºå½“æ¥æ”¶åŠŸç‡è¾¾åˆ°é˜ˆå€¼\(P_{CS}\)æ—¶å³å¯ã€‚è®°\(P_{CS}=\rho P_{th}\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­\(\rho \in (0, 1]\)ã€‚åˆ™æœ‰ä¸‹é¢çš„å…³ç³»ï¼š \[\begin{equation} E\left[L_{CS}\right]=\frac{E[R]}{\sqrt[\alpha]{\rho}} \end{equation}\] Reference [1] K. A. Hafeez, L. Zhao, B. Ma, and J. W. Mark, â€œPerformance analysis and enhancement of the dsrc for vanetâ€™s safety applications,â€ IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology, vol. 62, no. 7, pp. 3069â€“3083, 2013.

This Warfighter Information Network-Tactical equipped vehicle (center right) traverses the battlefield during Network Integration Evaluation 16.1 in September 2015 (U.S. Army photo by Amy Walker, PEO C3T Public Affairs) (Photo Credit: Amy Walker, PEO C3T Public Affairs) VIEW ORIGINAL 2008å¹´12æœˆ19æ—¥ï¼Œç¾å›½å›½é˜²éƒ¨å‘å¸ƒç¬¬8410.02å·æŒ‡ä»¤ã€Instruction 8410.02ã€‘ï¼Œæ­£å¼å°†NetOpsçº³å…¥åˆ°å…¨çƒä¿¡æ¯æ …æ ¼(GIG)çš„ä½“ç³»ä¸­æ¥ï¼š DoD Instruction 8410.02. DOWNLOAD! æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å°†NetOpså®šä½ä¸ºDoDï¼Œå³å›½é˜²éƒ¨å±‚é¢ç»Ÿä¸€çš„GIGç½‘ç»œæ“ä½œï¼Œç»„ç»‡å’Œæ–¹ä½æŠ€æœ¯æ”¯æŒã€‚å…·ä½“è€Œè¨€ï¼ŒNetOpsåŒ…å«çš„å…³é”®ä»»åŠ¡(Essential Tasks)ï¼Œä½†ä¸é™äºé›†å›¢ç®¡ç†(GIG Enterprise Management, GEM)ï¼Œç½‘ç»œä¿éšœ(GIG Net Assurance, GNA)ï¼Œå†…å®¹ç®¡ç†(GIG Content Management, GCM)ä»¥åŠç½‘ç»œé˜²å¾¡(GIG Net Defense, GND)ã€‚è¿™é‡Œçš„æ“ä½œï¼Œæ›´å¤šç¨‹åº¦ä¸Šæ˜¯æŒ‡ã€Œäººã€æˆ–è€…ã€Œéƒ¨é—¨ã€çš„åä½œã€‚æŒ‰ç…§Wikiä¸­çš„è¯´æ³•ï¼š NetOps provides assured NetCentric services to the DoD in support of full spectrum of warfighting operations, intelligence, and business missions throughout the GIG enterprises, seamlessly, end-to-end. An objective of NetCentric services is to quickly get information to decision makers, with adequate context, to make better decisions affecting the mission and to project their decisions forward to their forces for action. If the decision maker is not getting the needed net-centric services, the GIG NetOps community must collaboratively determine who must take action and how information flow can be optimized. This requires NetOps personnel to have a shared SA as well as the technologies, procedures, and collaborative organizational structures to rapidly assess and respond to system and network degradations, outages, or changes in operational priorities. All functions required to most effectively support GIG operations will be holistically managed. å³NetOpsåˆ¶å®šäº†è¿™æ ·çš„ä¸€å¥—å·¥ä½œæµç¨‹ï¼šå½“å†³ç­–åˆ¶å®šè€…éœ€è¦è·å–æŸç§ç½‘ç»œä¸­å¿ƒæœåŠ¡ï¼Œè€Œè¿™ç§è·å–ç®¡é“è¿˜ä¸å­˜åœ¨æ˜¯ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç”±NetOps Communityæ¥åå•†å‡ºç”±å“ªä¸ªéƒ¨é—¨æ¥è´Ÿè´£é‡‡å–å¿…è¦çš„è¡ŒåŠ¨æ¥å®ç°ä»¥åŠä¼˜åŒ–ä¿¡æ¯æµç®¡é“ã€‚ NetOps & WIN-T å¦‚ä¸Šæ‰€è¿°ï¼ŒNetOpsæ˜¯GIGä½“ç³»ä¸‹çš„ä¸€ç§æ•´ä½“çš„å·¥ä½œè§„èŒƒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå…·ä½“åˆ°GIGä¸‹çš„é€šä¿¡ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ŒNetOpsä¼šæœ‰å„è‡ªçš„å®ç°ã€‚ åœ¨WIN-Tä¸­ï¼Œ2016å¹´ï¼Œç¾å›½é™†å†›å°†WIN-Tä¸­çš„ç½‘ç»œç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿé¡¹ç›®Product Manager (PdM) WIN-T Increment 3æ›´åä¸ºPdM Tractical Cyber and Network Operations (TCNO)ã€‚ We are no longer focused on just supporting WIN-T systems; we now support the full gambit of devices and services on the mission command network, from handheld radios up to SATCOM on-the-move systems. Feedback gained from the evaluation will also support future network improvements.4 UNO UNO (Unified Network Operations) ä¸ºé™†å†›æ–¹é¢ä¸ºäº†æ•´åˆç°æœ‰æˆ˜ç•¥çº§åŠæˆ˜æœ¯çº§ç½‘ç»œç®¡ç†å·¥å…·è€Œæå‡ºçš„NetOpsæ¡†æ¶ã€‚å…¶åŠŸèƒ½å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š Delivers advancements in the monitoring, control and planning tools to simplify management of emerging voice, data and internet transport networks Modeling and simulation capability to analyze the best possible network configuration with dynamically changing network due to global complex variants Provides improved information assurance and Network Centric Enterprise Services Inherent software modernization through recurring technical refresh within the PM Tactical Network family of programs Provides NetOps users with the capability to â€œoperationalizeâ€ the planning, configuration, monitoring and management of the network through a single consistent tailorable user interface COE compliant, portable, and interactive common GUI with a user definable presentation workspace/dashboard Integrates network planning with mission planning, enabling the S6 to optimize capability to move data around the virtual battlefield in support of the Commanderâ€™s scheme of maneuver Integrates Upper Tactical Internet and Lower Tactical Internet network management tools and services Provides near-term â€œbridgingâ€ of NetOps capabilities for tactical radios and tactical network transmission systems operating within the tactical environment Sets the foundation for further integration of tactical and strategic networks for both network management services and cyberspace operations Reference Army enhances NetOps, the eyes and ears of the network Instruction 8410.02 - 2008 Department of Defense Global Information Grid Architectural Vision - 2007 WIN-T's NetOps and Cyber Security program reflagged with change of command Army Warfighter Network - Tactical (WIN-T) Theory of Operation ç¾å›½é™†å†›æˆ˜æœ¯çº§ä½œæˆ˜äººå‘˜ä¿¡æ¯ç½‘ç»œç›¸å…³é—®é¢˜åˆ†æåŠå¯ç¤º

\[\begin{equation} p=M / N=M /(K+M) \label{1} \end{equation}\] å³\(R_1\)å’Œ\(R_2\)åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºæ™®é€šè½¦è¾†ä¸ç¼–é˜ŸLeaderçš„é€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´ï¼Œä¸”\(R_1 < \[\begin{equation} f(k, x)=\frac{(\rho x)^{k} e^{-\rho x}}{k !}, k \geq 0 \end{equation}\] ä»¤\(X\)ä¸ºè¡¨ç¤ºè½¦é—´è·çš„éšæœºå˜é‡ã€‚åˆ™å…¶åˆ†å¸ƒå¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºæˆï¼š \[\begin{equation} \operatorname{Pr}\{X \leq x\}=h(x)=1-e^{-\rho x} \end{equation}\] è¿é€šæ¦‚ç‡åˆ†æ è®°\(X_{i} \quad(i=1,2, \ldots, N-1)\)ä»£è¡¨ç›¸é‚»ä¸¤è¾†è½¦çš„è½¦é—´è·åˆ†å¸ƒã€‚å½“è½¦é—´è·ä¸è¶…è¿‡é€šä¿¡èŒƒå›´æ—¶ï¼Œå³\(X_i \le R\)æ—¶ï¼Œè®¤ä¸ºä¸¤è¾†è½¦è¿é€šã€‚è®°\(P_c\)ä¸ºVANETçš„æ•´ä½“è¿é€šæ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œå³ï¼š \[\begin{equation} P_{c}=\operatorname{Pr}\left\{X_{1} \leq R, X_{2} \leq R, \ldots, X_{N-1} \leq R\right\} \end{equation}\] è¿™é‡Œ\(X_i\)æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹åŒåˆ†å¸ƒçš„ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} P_{c} &=\prod_{i=1}^{N-1} P_{r}\left\{X_{i} \leq R\right\} \\ &=\prod_{i=1}^{N-1}\left[(1-p) * P_{r}\left\{X_{i} \leq R_{1}\right\}+p * P_{r}\left\{X_{i} \leq R_{2}\right\}\right] \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] ä»£å…¥System Modelä¸­çš„æ³Šæ¾åˆ†å¸ƒæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæœ‰ \[\begin{equation} P_{c}=\left[(1-p)\left(1-e^{-\rho R_{1}}\right)+p\left(1-e^{-\rho R_{2}}\right)\right]^{N-1} \label{6} \end{equation}\] æ ¹æ®\(\eqref{6}\)ï¼Œ \[\begin{equation} p=\frac{1-e^{-\rho R_{1}}-P_{c}^{\frac{1}{N-1}}}{e^{-\rho R_{2}}-e^{-\rho R_{1}}} \end{equation}\] MAC Protocol åœ¨ä½œè€…æå‡ºçš„MACåè®®ä¸­ï¼ŒCCHIè¢«è¿›ä¸€æ­¥åˆ’åˆ†æˆSAFety Interval (SAFI), WSA Interval (WSAI)å’ŒACK value of backoff timer \(v(i, t)\): active stat of the backoff procedure è¿™é‡Œ\(i\)è¡¨ç¤ºåŒ…çš„ç±»åˆ«ã€‚1è¡¨ç¤ºWSAPï¼Œ2è¡¨ç¤ºWSAOã€‚ä»¤\(L_i\)ä¸ºç±»åˆ«\(i\)çš„æœ€å¤§é€€é¿é˜¶æ®µï¼Œ\(W_{i, m}\)ä¸ºç±»åˆ«\(i\)åœ¨ç¬¬\(m\)ä¸ªé€€é¿é˜¶æ®µçš„ç«äº‰çª—å£(CW)å¤§å°ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰\(s(i, t) = m, (0 \le m \le L_i), b(i, t) \in (0, W_{i, m})\)ã€‚å½“\(v(i, t) = 0\)æ—¶ï¼Œé€€é¿è¿‡ç¨‹è¢«å†»ç»“ï¼Œå³\(b(i, t)\)çš„å€¼ä¿æŒä¸å˜ã€‚åä¹‹ï¼Œå½“\(v(i, t) = -1\)æ—¶ï¼Œé€€é¿è¿‡ç¨‹æ­£å¸¸è¿›è¡Œã€‚åœ¨å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸Šè¿°çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡ä¹‹å\(\{s(i, t), b(i, t), v(i, t)\}\)ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ç”»å‡ºçŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾ã€‚ The Markov chain model of the WSAP transmission ä¸Šå›¾ä¸ºWSAPçš„çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªä¼˜å…ˆçº§è®¾ç½®ä¸‹ï¼Œåœ¨æ¯ä¸ªæ—¶éš™é€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨éƒ½ä¼šå‡1ï¼Œå³\(v(i, t) = -1\)ã€‚å³\(p_1\)ä¸ºç¢°æ’æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚åˆ™è½¬ç§»æ¦‚ç‡ä¸ºï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \operatorname{Pr}\{(j+1, k,-1) |(j,-1,-1)\}=p_{1} / W_{1, j+1}+1, & 0 \leq j \leq L_{1}-1,0 \leq k \leq W_{1, j+1} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(j, k-1,-1) |(j, k,-1)\} =1, & 0 \leq j \leq L_{1}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{1, j} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(0, k,-1) |(j,-1,-1)\} =\left(1-p_{1}\right) /\left(W_{1,0}+1\right), & 0 \leq j \leq L_{1}-1,0 \leq k \leq W_{1,0} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\left\{(0, k,-1) |\left(L_{1},-1,-1\right)\right\} =1 /\left(W_{1,0}+1\right), & 0 \leq j \leq L_{1}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{1,0} \end{array} \right. \label{8} \end{equation}\] ä»è¿™ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾å’Œè½¬ç§»æ¦‚ç‡è®¡ç®—æ¥çœ‹ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçš„é€€é¿å‘é€è¡Œä¸ºå’Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨WAVEé‡Œé¢æåˆ°çš„é€€é¿è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸å¤ªä¸€æ ·ã€‚è¿™é‡Œåœ¨è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§é€€é¿çª—å£åï¼Œä¼šé‡ç½®é€€é¿çª—å£å¤§å°ï¼Œå³ä¸ºReset backoff stage The Markov chain model of the WSAO transmission ä¸Šå›¾æ˜¯WSAOçš„çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾ã€‚å½“\(v(i, t) = 0\)æ—¶ï¼Œé€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨ä¼šåœæ­¢é€’å‡ã€‚ä»¤\(p_2, p_{2, \text{idle}}\)å’Œ\(p_{2, 0}\)åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºWSAOä¼ è¾“å¤±è´¥ï¼ŒWSAOå‘é€é‡åˆ°ç©ºé—²ä¿¡é“ï¼Œé‡åˆ°ç¹å¿™ä¿¡é“çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚è½¬ç§»æ¦‚ç‡ä¸ºï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \operatorname{Pr}\{(j+1, k, 0) |(j, -1,-1 ) \}=p_{2} /\left(W_{2, j+1}+1\right), & 0 \leq j \leq L_{2}-1,0 \leq k \leq W_{2, j+1} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(j, k-1,-1) |(j, k,-1)\} =p_{2, \text {idle}}, & 0 \leq j \leq L_{2}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{2, j-1} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(j, k, 0) |(j, k,-1)\} =1-p_{2, \text {idle}}, & 0 \leq j \leq L_{2}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{2, j-1} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(j, k, 0) |(j, k, 0)\} =p_{2,0}, & 0 < j \leq L_{2}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{2, j-1} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(j, k-1,-1) |(j, k, 0)\} =1-p_{2,0}, & 0 \leq j \leq L_{2}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{2, j-1} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\{(0, k, 0) |(j,-1,-1 ) \}=\left(1-p_{2}\right) /\left(W_{2,0}+1\right), & 0 \leq j \leq L_{2}-1,0 \leq k \leq W_{2,0} \\ \operatorname{Pr}\left\{(0, k,-1) |\left(L_{2},-1,-1\right)\right\} =1 /\left(W_{2,0}+1\right), & 0 \leq j \leq L_{2}, 0 \leq k \leq W_{2,0} \end{array} \right. \label{9} \end{equation}\] ç¨³æ€åˆ†å¸ƒ æ±‚è§£\(\eqref{8}\)å’Œ\(\eqref{9}\)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ±‚å¾—ç¨³æ€åˆ†å¸ƒã€‚WSAPçš„ä¼ è¾“æ¦‚ç‡\(p_i\)å’ŒWSAOçš„ä¼ è¾“æ¦‚ç‡\(p_j\)ä¸ºï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{ \begin{array}{l} { p_{i}=\frac{1-p_{1}^{L_{1}+1}}{\sum_{j=0}^{L_{1}} w_{1, j} \ / 2 * p_{1}^{j}\left(1-p_{1}\right)+2\left(1-p_{1}^{L_{1}+1}\right)} } \\ { p_{j}=\frac{1-p_{1}^{L_2+1}}{\sum_{j=0}^{L_{2}} w_{2, j} \ / 2 * p_{2}^{j}\left(1-p_{2}\right)+1-p_{2}^{L_{2}+1}} } \end{array} \right. \label{10} \end{equation}\] æ ¹æ®[3]çš„ç»“è®ºï¼Œæœ€å¤§ååç‡å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¿¡é“çš„ç©ºé—²çŠ¶æ€çš„å¹³å‡æŒç»­æ—¶é—´å’Œç¹å¿™çŠ¶æ€çš„å¹³å‡æŒç»­æ—¶é—´ç›¸ç­‰æ—¶è¾¾åˆ°ï¼Œå³ \[\begin{equation} \label{11} E[i d l e]=E[c o l l] \Rightarrow p_{i d l e} * T_{i d l e}=p_{c o l l} * T_{c o l l} \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­: \(p_{i d l e}\)ä¸ºä¿¡é“ä¸ºä¿¡é“ç©ºé—²çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼› \(p_{c o l l}\)ä¸ºä¿¡é“å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼› \(T_{i d l e}\)ä¸ºç©ºé—²æ—¶éš™çš„é•¿åº¦ \(T_{c o l l}\)ä¸ºCCHä¸Šå‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’æ—¶æŒç»­çš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚ è¿›ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œè®°ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(p_{busy}\)ï¼ŒåŒ…æˆåŠŸå‘ç”Ÿçš„æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(p_{succ}\)ï¼Œåˆ™\(p_{coll} = p_{busy} - p_{succ}\)ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰ä¸‹é¢çš„æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{\begin{aligned} p_{1} &=1-\left(1-p_{i}\right)^{M-1} *\left(1-p_{j}\right)^{K} \\ p_{2} &=1-\left(1-p_{i}\right)^{M} *\left(1-p_{j}\right)^{K-1} \\ p_{i d l e} &=\left(1-p_{i}\right)^{M-1} *\left(1-p_{j}\right)^{K-1} \\ p_{b u s y} &=1-p_{i d l e}=1-\left(1-p_{i}\right)^{M-1} *\left(1-p_{j}\right)^{K-1} \\ p_{s u c c} &=M * p_{i} *\left(1-p_{i}\right)^{M-1} *\left(1-p_{j}\right)^{K} \\ &+K * p_{j} *\left(1-p_{i}\right)^{M} *\left(1-p_{j}\right)^{K-1} \end{aligned}\right. \label{12} \end{equation}\] è®°\(T_{SAF\_pkt}, T_{WSA\_pkt}, T_{ACK\_pkt}, T_{SIFS}\)åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºå‘é€å®‰å…¨æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼ŒWSAæ¶ˆæ¯ï¼ŒACKæ¶ˆæ¯çš„æ—¶é—´ä»¥åŠSIFSçš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚ä¸ºäº†ç®€åŒ–åˆ†æï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»¤\(T_{coll}\)ä¸ºæœ€å¤§ç¢°æ’æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå³ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªWSAåŒ…çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç‰¹å’Œä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªWSAåŒ…çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”ç‰¹å‘ç”Ÿäº†ç¢°æ’ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{\begin{aligned} T_{i d l e} &=a S l o t T i m e \\ T_{c o l l} &=2 * T_{W S A \_p k t}+T_{S I F S} \\ T_{s u c c} &=T_{W S A_{-} p k t}+T_{S I F S} \end{aligned}\right. \label{13} \end{equation}\] æ ¹æ®å…¬å¼\(\eqref{10}-\eqref{13}\)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ±‚è§£å‡º\(p_i\)å’Œ\(p_j\)ã€‚ Reference [1] G. Bianchi, â€œPerformance analysis of the ieee 802.11 distributed coordination function,â€ IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications, vol. 18, no. 3, pp. 535â€“547, 2000. [2] C. Shao, S. Leng, B. Fan, Y. Zhang, A. Vinel, and M. Jonsson, â€œConnectivity-aware medium access control in platoon-based vehicular ad hoc networks,â€ in 2015 ieee international conference on communications (icc), 2015, pp. 3305â€“3310. [3] J. Mao, Y. Mao, S. Leng, and X. Bai, â€œPerformance optimization for ieee 802.11 with qos differentiation supporting,â€ Journal of Software, vol. 21, no. 11, pp. 2866â€“2882, 2010.

entry.content: å‰è¨€ äºŒç»´é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«é“¾æ˜¯åœ¨æ¶‰åŠåŒ…å«é€€é¿è¿‡ç¨‹çš„DCFæœºåˆ¶çš„æœ€å¸¸ç”¨æ¨¡å‹ã€‚è¿™éƒ¨åˆ†ç†è®ºå·¥ä½œçš„æ–‡ç« å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†å¯ä»¥è¿½æº¯åˆ°Bianchiåœ¨2000å¹´çš„ç»å…¸è®ºæ–‡[1]ã€‚è¿™ç¯‡è®ºæ–‡åœ¨è¿‡å»è¿‘20å¹´é‡Œè·å¾—äº†å°†è¿‘ä¸€ä¸‡æ¡å¼•ç”¨ã€‚è¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨ä»‹ç»WAVEåè®®æ—¶è¯¦ç»†æåˆ°è¿‡ã€‚ Bianchiçš„ç»å…¸è®ºæ–‡ å¼•å…¥ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™æ¡ä»¶ è¿™éƒ¨åˆ†çš„å†…å®¹ä¸»è¦æ¥è‡ª[2]ã€‚ System Model æ²¿ç”¨äº†Bianchiçš„å‡è®¾æ¡ä»¶ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬æœ‰é™æ•°é‡çš„é€šä¿¡èŠ‚ç‚¹(\(n\)ä¸ª)ä»¥åŠç†æƒ³ä¿¡é“æ¡ä»¶ã€‚è¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ä¸­ç ”ç©¶çš„æ˜¯é¥±å’Œæ¡ä»¶ä¸‹çš„ç¨³æ€æ€§èƒ½ã€‚é¥±å’Œæ¡ä»¶æ„å‘³ç€å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå½“å…¶å®Œæˆä¸€æ¬¡ä¼ è¾“æ—¶ï¼Œç«‹åˆ»å°±æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„åŒ…ç­‰å¾…ä¼ è¾“ã€‚ æ–‡ç« é‡‡ç”¨çš„DCFæœºåˆ¶æ˜¯ç»å…¸çš„DCFæœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬æŒ‡æ•°å¢é•¿çš„é€€é¿çª—å£ï¼Œåœ¨é€€é¿æœŸé—´ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™æ—¶ï¼Œé€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼å†»ç»“ã€‚é€€é¿çª—å£åˆ°è¾¾æœ€å¤§ä»¥åï¼Œåœæ­¢å¢é•¿ã€‚è‹¥å‘é€å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ™çª—å£ä¿æŒæœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚åä¹‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœå‘é€æˆåŠŸï¼Œåˆ™é‡ç½®é€€é¿çª—å£ã€‚ éšæœºå˜é‡çš„å®šä¹‰åˆ™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š\(b(t)\)å®šä¹‰ä¸ºåœ¨tæ—¶éš™ä¸Šçš„é€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨å–å€¼ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹é€€é¿çª—å£çš„å®šä¹‰ä¸º \[\begin{equation} \begin{array}{l} W_{\min} = W \\ W_{\max} = 2^{m} W \end{array} \end{equation}\] å³å…±æœ‰\(m+1\)ä¸ªé€€é¿é˜¶æ®µ(backoff stage)ã€‚\(s(t)\)ä¸ºç”¨æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºé€€é¿é˜¶æ®µçš„éšæœºå˜é‡ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆäºŒå…ƒéšæœºè¿‡ç¨‹\(\{s(t), b(t)\}\)æ„æˆäºŒç»´ç¦»æ•£é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«é“¾ã€‚è®°æ¡ä»¶ç¢°æ’æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(p\)ï¼Œä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(p_b\)ã€‚å‡å®š\(p\)ä¸\(p_b\)ä¸é€€é¿è¿‡ç¨‹æ— å…³ã€‚å½“\(W\)å’Œ\(n\)æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§æ—¶æ­¤å‡è®¾æ›´åŠ å‡†ç¡®ã€‚ äºŒå…ƒéšæœºè¿‡ç¨‹\(\{s(t), b(t)\}\)çš„çŠ¶æ€å€¼è®°ä¸º\(\{i, k\}\)ã€‚å…¶ä¸­\(0 \leq i \leq m, 0 \leq k \leq W_i - 1\), å…¶ä¸­\(W_i = 2^i W\)ã€‚æ¨¡å‹ä¸­è¿˜å­˜åœ¨å¦ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€\(\{-1, 0\}\)ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ä»£è¡¨å½“é€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨ä¸º0ï¼Œä¸”ç»è¿‡DIFSæ—¶é—´åä¿¡é“ç©ºé—²æ—¶ï¼ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¼šåœ¨å½“å‰æ—¶éš™ç«‹å³å‘é€æ•°æ®ã€‚\(\{-1, 0\}\)è¿™ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€åˆ»ç”»äº†æ­¤è¡Œä¸ºã€‚è¿™ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€æœªåœ¨Bianchiçš„æ¨¡å‹ä¸­å¼•å…¥ã€‚ æ¦‚ç‡è½¬ç§»å›¾å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š è½¬ç§»æ¦‚ç‡ä¸ºï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} P\{-1, 0 | -1, 0\} = (1 - p) (1 - p_b) \\ P\{0, k | -1, 0\} = \frac{(1 - p)p_b + p}{W_0}, & 0 \leq k \leq W_0 - 1 \\ P\{i, k | i, k\} = p_b, & 1 \leq k \leq W_i - 1 \quad 0 \leq i \leq m \\ P\{i, k | i, k + 1\} = 1 - p_b, & 1 \leq k \leq W_i - 2 \quad 0 \leq i \leq m \\ P\{0, k | i, 0\} = \frac{(1 - p)p_b}{W_0}, & 0 \leq k \leq W_i - 1 \quad 0 \leq i \leq m \\ P\{-1, 0 | i, 0\} = (1 - p)(1 - p_b), & 0 \leq i \leq m \\ P\{i, k | i - 1, 0\} = \frac{p}{W_i}, & 1 \leq k \leq W_i - 1 \quad 0 \leq i \leq m \\ P\{m, k | m, 0\} = \frac{p}{W_m}, & 0 \leq k \leq W_m = 1 \end{array} \right. \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­ï¼š ç¬¬ä¸€é¡¹æŒ‡ç»è¿‡å‰ä¸€ä¸ªæˆåŠŸçš„å‘é€ä¹‹ååˆè§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°ä¿¡é“ç©ºé—²å¹¶ç«‹åˆ»å‘é€å½“å‰æ•°æ®åŒ…ï¼› ç¬¬äºŒé¡¹æŒ‡ç»è¿‡å‰ä¸€ä¸ªæˆåŠŸçš„å‘é€ä¹‹åå‘é€å½“å‰æ•°æ®åŒ…æ—¶å‘ç°ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™æˆ–è€…å‘é€äº§ç”Ÿäº†ç¢°æ’ï¼Œä»è€Œè¿›å…¥é€€é¿çŠ¶æ€ï¼› ç¬¬ä¸‰é¡¹è¡¨ç¤ºåœ¨é€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨é€’å‡è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç°ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™ï¼Œæ•…å†»ç»“è®¡æ•°å™¨å€¼ï¼› ç¬¬å››é¡¹è¡¨ç¤ºé€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨åœ¨ç©ºé—²ä¿¡é“ä¸‹é€’å‡ï¼› ç¬¬äº”é¡¹è¡¨ç¤ºé€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨åˆ°0ä¹‹åï¼Œå½“å‰åŒ…å‘é€æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å‘ç°å‘é€ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®åŒ…æ—¶ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™ï¼› ç¬¬å…­é¡¹è¡¨ç¤ºé€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨åˆ°0ä¹‹åï¼Œå½“å‰åŒ…å‘é€æˆåŠŸä¸”è¢«æˆåŠŸæ¥æ”¶ï¼Œä¸”æ£€æµ‹åˆ°ä¿¡é“ç©ºé—²ã€‚ ç¬¬ä¸ƒé¡¹è¡¨ç¤ºé€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨åˆ°0ä¹‹åä¼ è¾“å¤±è´¥ï¼Œå¢åŠ é€€é¿çª—å£ï¼› ç¬¬å…«é¡¹è¡¨ç¤ºè¾¾åˆ°äº†æœ€å¤§é€€é¿çª—å£åï¼Œä¼ è¾“å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯é€€é¿çª—å£ä¸å†å¢åŠ ã€‚ æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦è®¡ç®—ç¨³æ€æ¦‚ç‡åˆ†å¸ƒã€‚è®°å¹³ç¨³åˆ†å¸ƒä¸º\(b_{i, k} = \lim_{t\rightarrow \infty} P\{s(t) = i, b(t) = k\}\)ã€‚å¯¹äºå¹³ç¨³åˆ†å¸ƒæˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹çš„å…³ç³»ï¼š \[\begin{equation} b_{i, 0}=p^{i} b_{0,0} 0 \leq i \leq m-1 \end{equation}\] \[\begin{equation} b_{m, 0}=\frac{p^{m}}{1-p} b_{0,0} \end{equation}\] \[\begin{equation} b_{i, k}=\frac{W_{i}-k}{W_{i}} \frac{1}{1-p_{b}} b_{i, 0} \quad 0 \leq i \leq m 1 \leq k \leq W_{i}-1 \end{equation}\] \[\begin{equation} b_{0,0}=\frac{p_{b}+p\left(1-p_{b}\right)}{1-p_{b}} b_{-1,0} \end{equation}\] ç„¶åä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™åŒ–æ¡ä»¶ \[\begin{equation} b_{-1,0}+\sum_{i=0}^{m} \sum_{k=0}^{W_{i}-1} b_{i, k}=1 \end{equation}\] ç»è¿‡æ¨å¯¼å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ° \[\begin{equation} b_{-1,0}=\frac{2\left(1-p_{b}\right)^{2}(1-2 p)(1-p)}{2\left(1-p_{b}\right)^{2}(1-2 p)(1-p)+\left(p_{b}+p\left(1-p_{b}\right)\right)(1-2 p)(W+1)+p W\left(p_{b}+p\left(1-p_{b}\right)\right)\left(1-(2 p)^{m}\right)} \end{equation}\] å·²çŸ¥å¹³ç¨³åˆ†å¸ƒä»¥åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å¯¹äºæŸä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä»»æ„æ—¶éš™çš„ä¼ è¾“æ¦‚ç‡ \[\begin{equation} \tau=\sum_{i=-1}^{m} b_{i, 0}=b_{-1,0}+\sum_{i=0}^{m-1} b_{i, 0}+b_{m, 0} \end{equation}\] å½“é€€é¿è®¡æ•°å™¨åˆ°0æ—¶ï¼ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹å³ä¼šå°è¯•å‘é€æ•°æ®åŒ…ã€‚ è¿™ä¸ªå…¬å¼å…¨éƒ¨å±•å¼€ä¹Ÿéå¸¸é•¿ï¼Œä¸è¿‡ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç®€å•çš„å¤šé¡¹å¼è®¡ç®— \[\begin{equation} \label{eq:transmission_prob} \tau=\frac{2\left(1-p_{b}\right)(1-2 p)}{2\left(1-p_{b}\right)^{2}(1-2 p)(1-p)+\left(p_{b}+p\left(1-p_{b}\right)(1-2 p)(W+1)+p W\left(p_{b}+p\left(1-p_{b}\right)\right)\left(1-(2 p)^{m}\right)\right.} \end{equation}\] è¿›è€Œå¾—åˆ°ç¢°æ’æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º \[\begin{equation} \label{eq:collision_prob} p=1-(1-\tau)^{n-1} \end{equation}\] ä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™çš„æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º \[\begin{equation} \label{eq:medium_busy_prob} p_{b}=1-(1-\tau)^{n} \end{equation}\] å°†\(\eqref{eq:collision_prob}\)åŠ\(\eqref{eq:medium_busy_prob}\)ä»£å…¥\(\eqref{eq:transmission_prob}\)å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°å…³äº\(\tau\)çš„éçº¿æ€§æ–¹ç¨‹ã€‚æ­¤æ–¹ç¨‹å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æ•°å€¼æ–¹æ³•æ±‚è§£ã€‚ æ€§èƒ½åˆ†æ ç±»ä¼¼Bianchiçš„åšæ³•ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè®¤ä¸ºå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡ä¼ è¾“ï¼Œæ— è®ºæˆåŠŸä¸éï¼Œéƒ½è§†ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—ç›¸é‚»ä¸¤æ¬¡ä¼ è¾“ä¹‹é—´çš„CSMA/CAåè®®çš„ååç‡ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶ååç‡\(S\)å¯ä»¥è¡¨è¾¾ä¸º: \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} S &=\frac{E[\text { time used for successful transmission in an interval }]}{E[\text { length between two consecutive transmissions }]} \\ &=\frac{P_{s} E[P]}{E[\Psi]+P_{s} T_{s}+\left(1-P_{s}\right) T_{c}} \end{aligned} \label{eq:throughput} \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\(E[P]\)ä¸ºPayloadçš„å¹³å‡å¤§å°ã€‚\(T_s\)ä¸ºæˆåŠŸä¼ è¾“çš„å¹³å‡æ—¶é—´ï¼Œ\(T_c\)ä¸ºå†²çªçš„å¹³å‡æŒç»­æ—¶é—´ã€‚\(P_s\)ä¸ºä¼ è¾“æˆåŠŸçš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚è€Œ\(E[\Psi]\)åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºåœ¨ä¼ è¾“å‘ç”Ÿä¹‹å‰ç”±äºé€€é¿å¼•å…¥çš„ç©ºä½™æ—¶éš™çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬æˆ‘ä»¬å‡å®šåŒ…çš„å¤§å°éƒ½æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ï¼Œå³\(E[P] = P\)ã€‚\(T_s\)å’Œ\(T_c\)çš„å€¼å–å†³äºå…·ä½“çš„DCFæœºåˆ¶ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \begin{array}{l}{T_{\mathrm{s}}^{\mathrm{ack}}=H+P+\delta+\mathrm{SIFS}+\mathrm{ACK}+\delta+\mathrm{DIFS}} \\ {T_{\mathrm{c}}^{\mathrm{ack}}=H+P+\delta+\mathrm{DIFS}}\end{array} \} ACK CSMA/CA \end{equation}\] \[\begin{equation} \begin{array}{l}{T_{\mathrm{s}}^{\mathrm{rets}}=\mathrm{RTS}+\delta+\mathrm{SIFS}+\mathrm{CTS}+\delta+\mathrm{SIFS}+H+P+\delta+\mathrm{SIFS}+\mathrm{ACK}+\delta+\mathrm{DIFS}} \\ {T_{\mathrm{c}}^{\mathrm{rets}}=\mathrm{RTS}+\delta+\mathrm{D} \mathrm{IFS}}\end{array} \} RTS/CTS CSMA/CA \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­\(H=\mathrm{PHY}_{\mathrm{hdr}}+\mathrm{MAC}_{\mathrm{hdr}}\)ä¸ºå¸§å¤´ï¼Œ\(\delta\)ä¸ºä¼ è¾“å»¶æ—¶ã€‚ä¼ è¾“æˆåŠŸè¦è¦æ±‚æœ‰ä¸”ä»…æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å‚ä¸ä¼ è¾“ï¼Œæ•… \[\begin{equation} P_{\mathrm{s}}=\frac{n \tau(1-\tau)^{n-1}}{1-(1-\tau)^{n}} \end{equation}\] æœ€åï¼š \[\begin{equation} E[\Psi]=\frac{1}{p_{b}}-1 \end{equation}\] æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„æ‰€æœ‰æ—¶é—´å˜é‡éƒ½æ˜¯è¡¨ç¤ºçš„æ—¶éš™æ•°é‡ã€‚é€šè¿‡ä¸Šé¢çš„å¼å­æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å‡ºååç‡\(\eqref{eq:throughput}\)ã€‚ æ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹: ç›¸æ¯”æ³Šæ¾è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œæ›´æ–°è¿‡ç¨‹çº¦æŸæ›´å°‘ï¼Œç®—æ˜¯å¯¹æ³Šæ¾è¿‡ç¨‹çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ¨å¹¿ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ä¸‹é¢çš„å‡ ä¸ªå®šä¹‰æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æ¨å‡ºæ³Šæ¾è¿‡ç¨‹çš„ï¼š k)\)ï¼ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­è¿˜æœ‰å…¶ä»–åŒ…ï¼‰æˆ–è€…\(I\)ï¼ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©ºï¼‰çš„çŠ¶æ€ã€‚è‹¥å‘é€å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ™ç­‰åŒäºé­å—ç¢°æ’ï¼Œè¿›å…¥çŠ¶æ€\((i + 1, k)\)ã€‚ ä¸Šå›¾çš„çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾çš„æ¦‚ç‡è½¬ç§»çŸ©é˜µä¸ºï¼š \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} & P_{i, k | i, k + 1} & = & 1, & & k \in [0, W_i - 2], i \in [0, m] \\ & P_{0, k | i, 0} & = & q\left(1-P_{e q}\right) / W_{0}, & & k \in\left[0, W_{0}-1\right], i \in[0, m] \\ & P_{i, k | i - 1, 0} & = & P_{eq}/W_i, & & k \in\left[0, W_{i}-1\right], i \in[1, m] \\ & P_{m, k | m, 0} & = & P_{eq} / W_m, & & k \in \left[0, W_m - 1\right] \\ & P_{I | i, 0} & = & (1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right), & & i \in[0, m] \\ & P_{0, k | I} & = & (1 - q)(1 - P_{eq}), & & k \in [0, W_0 - 1]\\ & P_{I | I} & = & 1 - q & & \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å¹³ç¨³åˆ†å¸ƒ \[\begin{equation} b_{i, k}=\lim _{t \rightarrow \infty} P[s(t)=i, b(t)=k], \forall k \in\left[0, W_{i}-1\right], \forall i \in[0, m] \end{equation}\] é¦–å…ˆæˆ‘ä»¬æ³¨æ„åˆ° \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} & {b_{i, 0}} & {=} & {P_{e q} \cdot b_{i-1,0}=P_{e q}^{i} \cdot b_{0,0},} & & {\forall i \in[1, m-1]} \\ & {b_{m, 0}} & {=} & {\frac{P_{e q}^{m}}{1-P_{e q}} \cdot b_{0,0},} & & {i=m} \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] ä¸Šé¢ğŸ‘†çš„çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾ä¸­çŠ¶æ€\(b_I\)è€ƒè™‘äº†ä¸€æ¬¡æˆåŠŸä¼ è¾“ä»¥åé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©ºçš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œä»¥åŠè¿ç»­çš„ç©ºé—²çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå› æ­¤æœ‰ \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} b_{I} &=(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right) \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}+(1-q) \cdot b_{I} \\ &=\frac{(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{q} \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0} \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] å¯¹äºå…¶ä»–çŠ¶æ€çš„ç¨³æ€åˆ†å¸ƒ(\(k\in [1, W_i - 1]\))ï¼Œæœ‰ \[\begin{equation} b_{i, k}=\frac{W_{i}-k}{W_{i}}\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{q\left(1-P_{e q}\right) \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}+q \cdot b_{I},} & {i=0} \\ {P_{e q} \cdot b_{i-1,0},} & {i \in[1, m-1]} \\ {P_{e q}\left(b_{m-1,0}+b_{m, 0}\right),} & {i=m}\end{array}\right. \end{equation}\] å°†\(b_I\)ä»£å…¥åˆ°ä¸Šå¼ï¼Œæœ‰ \[\begin{equation} \begin{array}{l}{q\left(1-P_{e q}\right) \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}+q \cdot b_{I}=} \\ {=q\left(1-P_{e q}\right) \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}+q \cdot \frac{(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{q} \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}} \\ {=\left(1-P_{e q}\right)[q+(1-q)] \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}} \\ {=\left(1-P_{e q}\right) \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}}\end{array} \end{equation}\] åº”ç”¨æ­£åˆ™åŒ–æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œæœ‰ \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} 1 & = \sum_{i = 0}^{m}\sum_{k = 0}^{W_i - 1}b_{i, k} + b_I \\ & = \begin{array}{l}{\frac{b_{0,0}}{2}\left[W\left(\sum_{i=0}^{m-1}\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{i}+\frac{\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}}{1-P_{e q}}\right)+\frac{1}{1-P_{e q}}\right]+} \\ {+\frac{(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{q} \cdot \sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}}\end{array} \\ & = \begin{array}{l}{\frac{b_{0,0}}{2}\left[W\left(\sum_{i=0}^{m-1}\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{i}+\frac{\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}}{1-P_{e q}}\right)+\frac{1}{1-P_{e q}}\right]+} \\ {+\frac{(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{q} \cdot \frac{b_{0,0}}{1-P_{e q}}}\end{array} \\ & = \frac{b_{0,0}}{2}\left[W\left(\sum_{i=0}^{m-1}\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{i}+\frac{\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}}{1-P_{e q}}\right)+\frac{1}{1-P_{e q}}+\frac{2(1-q)}{q}\right] \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] è§£å‡ºæ¥å¾—åˆ°å¦‚ä¸‹ç»“æœï¼ˆè¿™ä¸äººé“ï¼ï¼‰ \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} & b_{0, 0} = \frac{2}{\frac{W\left[\left(1-P_{e q}\right) \sum_{i=0}^{m-1}\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{i}+\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}\right]+1+2 \frac{1-q}{q}\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{1-P e q}} \\ & = \frac{2\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{\left(W-P_{e q} W\right) \frac{1-\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}}{\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)}+W\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}+1+2 \frac{(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)}{q}} \\ & =\frac{2\left(1-P_{e q}\right)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right) q}{q\left[(W+1)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)+W P_{e q}\left(1-\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}\right)\right]+2(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)} \\ \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] å½“\(q \rightarrow \infty\)æ—¶ï¼Œå³å¾—åˆ°äº†é¥±å’Œæƒ…å½¢ä¸‹çš„ç¨³æ€åˆ†å¸ƒã€‚å†å¦‚æœæ·»åŠ ç†æƒ³ä¿¡é“æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ™\(P_e = 0\)ï¼Œåˆ™æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å°†ä¸Šå¼ç®€åŒ–ä¸º \[\begin{equation} \lim _{q \rightarrow 1} b_{0,0} \rightarrow \frac{2\left(1-P_{c o l}\right)\left(1-2 P_{c o l}\right)}{(W+1)\left(1-2 P_{c o l}\right)+W P_{c o l}\left(1-\left(2 P_{c o l}\right)^{m}\right)} \end{equation}\] è¿™ä¸ªå…¬å¼å’ŒBianchiä¸­å¾—åˆ°çš„å¹³ç¨³åˆ†å¸ƒå¼ä¸€è‡´çš„ã€‚åŸºäºç¨³æ€åˆ†å¸ƒæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—ä¼ è¾“æ¦‚ç‡\(\tau\) \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} \tau &=\sum_{i=0}^{m} b_{i, 0}=\frac{b_{0,0}}{1-P_{e q}}=\\=& \frac{2 (1 - 2P_{eq})q}{q\left[(W+1)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)+W P_{e q}\left(1-\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}\right)\right]+2(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)} \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] ç»§è€Œå¾—åˆ°ç¢°æ’æ¦‚ç‡ \[\begin{equation} P_{c o l}=1-(1-\tau)^{N-1}-P_{c a p} \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­\(P_{cap}\)ä¸ºChannel captureçš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚\(P_{cap}\)ä¸ºå¦‚ä¸‹å½¢å¼ï¼Œå…·ä½“æ¨å¯¼å‚è€ƒåŸæ–‡: \[\begin{equation} P_{c a p}=\sum_{i=1}^{N-1}\left(\begin{array}{c}{N} \\ {i+1}\end{array}\right) \tau^{i+1}(1-\tau)^{N-i-1} P_{c p}\left(\gamma>z_{o} g\left(S_{f}\right) | i\right) \end{equation}\] ç»§è€Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦æ±‚è§£ä¸€ä¸ªå››å…ƒéçº¿æ€§æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æ•°å€¼æ–¹æ³•æ±‚è§£ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{\begin{array}{l}{\tau=\frac{2\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right) q}{q\left[(W+1)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)+W P_{e q}\left(1-\left(2 P_{e q}\right)^{m}\right)\right]+2(1-q)\left(1-P_{e q}\right)\left(1-2 P_{e q}\right)}} \\ {P_{e q}=1-(1-\tau)^{N-1}-P_{c a p}} \\ {P_{e q}=P_{c o l}+P_{e}-P_{e} \cdot P_{c o l}} \\ {P_{c a p}=\sum_{i=1}^{N-1}\left(\begin{array}{c}{N} \\ {i+1}\end{array}\right) \tau^{i+1}(1-\tau)^{N-i-1} \frac{1}{\left(1+z_{0} g\left(S_{f}\right)\right)^{i}}}\end{array}\right. \end{equation}\] æœ€åå¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å½’ä¸€åŒ–ååç‡ï¼š \[\begin{equation} S=\frac{P_{t} \cdot P_{s} \cdot\left(1-P_{e}\right) E[P L]}{\left(1-P_{t}\right) \sigma+P_{t}\left(1-P_{s}\right) T_{c}+P_{t} P_{s}\left(1-P_{e}\right) T_{s}+P_{t} P_{s} P_{e} T_{e}} \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­ \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} & P_t & = & 1 - (1 - \tau)^N \\ & P_s & = & \frac{N\tau (1 - \tau)^{N - 1} + P_{cap}}{P_t} \\ & T_c & = & H + P L + ACK_{timeout} \\ & T_s & = & H + P L + S I F S + \tau_p + A C K + D I F S + \tau_p \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] \(E[PL]\)ä¸ºPayloadçš„å¹³å‡å¤§å°ï¼Œ\(\sigma\)ä¸ºç©ºé—²æ—¶éš™çš„å¤§å°ã€‚ åŒ…è¾¾åˆ°è¿‡ç¨‹ä»¥åŠ\(q\)çš„ä¼°ç®— åŒ…çš„åˆ°è¾¾è¿‡ç¨‹å»ºæ¨¡æˆå‚æ•°ä¸º\(\lambda\)çš„Poissonè¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚å‚æ•°\(\lambda\)ä»£è¡¨äº†å•ä½æ—¶é—´å†…åˆ°è¾¾çš„åŒ…çš„ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚ç›¸åº”çš„ï¼ŒåŒ…åˆ°è¾¾çš„é—´éš”ä¸º\(\frac{1}{\lambda}\)ã€‚å› æ­¤ \[\begin{equation} q=1-e^{-\lambda E\left[S_{t s}\right]} \end{equation}\] å…¶ä¸­\(E[S_{ts}]\)ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè™šæ‹Ÿæ—¶éš™çš„å¤§å°ã€‚ \[\begin{equation} \begin{aligned} E\left[S_{t s}\right]=&\left(1-P_{t}\right) \cdot \sigma+P_{t}\left(1-P_{s}\right) \cdot T_{c}+\\ &+P_{t} P_{s} P_{e} \cdot T_{e}+P_{t} P_{s}\left(1-P_{e}\right) \cdot T_{s} \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] è®¨è®ºï¼šäº‹å®ä¸Šï¼Œä»æˆ‘çš„åˆ†ææ¥çœ‹ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçš„è¿™ä¸ªå¤„ç†æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å­˜åœ¨é—®é¢˜çš„ã€‚é—®é¢˜åŒ…å«ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹é¢ï¼š1) å¦‚æ­¤å¤„ç†éœ€è¦å‡è®¾èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—å®¹é‡åªæœ‰1ï¼Œä¸ç„¶æˆ‘ä»¬å°±éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥æ›´åŠ å¤æ‚çš„æ’é˜Ÿè®ºç†è®ºæ¥è¿›è¡Œåˆ†æã€‚å½“ç„¶ï¼Œå¼•å…¥æ’é˜Ÿè®ºä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥åˆ†æçš„ï¼›2ï¼‰åˆ©ç”¨Poissonè¿‡ç¨‹è®¨è®ºçš„æ—¶é—´ä¸åº”è¯¥åªé™äºä¸€ä¸ªè™šæ‹Ÿæ—¶éš™ã€‚è€Œæ˜¯åº”è¯¥è€ƒè™‘å‘é€å»¶æ—¶ã€‚å³å‘é€å®Œä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…éœ€è¦çš„æ—¶é—´å†…å¯èƒ½ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„åŒ…çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚è€Œä¸æ˜¯åªç›¯ç€ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶éš™ã€‚è¿™ä¸€å»¶æ—¶çš„è®¡ç®—æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒä¸Šé¢çš„3.3ç« é€€é¿çª—å£å¹¶ä¸”å‘èµ·é‡ä¼ ï¼Œä¼ ç»Ÿçš„äºŒç»´é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«é“¾ä¸­çš„äºŒå…ƒçŠ¶æ€å˜é‡ä¸­çš„backoff stageå¤±å»æ„ä¹‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤åªéœ€è¦ç”¨backoff counterè¿™ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡å³å¯è¡¨å¾å¹¿æ’­æ¥å…¥ä¿¡é“çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚ è¿™é‡Œæ•´ç†çš„ä¸€ç»´é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«è¿‡ç¨‹çš„ç ”ç©¶ä¸»è¦æ¥è‡ªäº[1]ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶åŒ…å«é¥±å’Œä»¥åŠä¸é¥±å’Œåœºæ™¯çš„æ€§èƒ½åˆ†æã€‚ ä¸€ç»´é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«é“¾ ç½‘ç»œç»“æ„ä¸ºçš„å•è·³Adhocç½‘ç»œï¼ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹æ€»æ•°ä¸º\(n\)ã€‚ä¼ è¾“ç¯å¢ƒä¸ºï¼ša two-ray propagation model with no hidden terminal or capture effectsï¼Œå³æ‰€æœ‰çš„åŒ…ä¸¢å¤±éƒ½æ˜¯ç”±äºç¢°æ’(Collision)å¯¼è‡´çš„ã€‚å‡è®¾æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ¯æ¬¡åªèƒ½ç¼“å­˜ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®åŒ…ï¼Œä¸”åŒ…çš„åˆ°è¾¾è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸ºåˆ°è¾¾ç‡ä¸º\(\lambda\)çš„Poissonè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œ éé¥±å’ŒçŠ¶æ€ä¸‹çš„ä¸€ç»´é©¬å°”ç§‘å¤«é“¾çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»å›¾ å¦‚ä¸Šå›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œé€€é¿çª—å£ä¸º\(W\)ï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€é€€é¿çŠ¶æ€ä¸€å…±æœ‰\(W\)ä¸ªï¼Œä»¥åŠä¸€ä¸ªé¢å¤–çš„IdleçŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆè®°ä¸º\(I\)ï¼‰ã€‚åŒæ—¶è®°åŒ…çš„åˆ°è¾¾æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(q\)ï¼Œä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™çš„æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(q_b\)ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰ä¸‹é¢çš„æ¦‚ç‡è½¬ç§»çŸ©é˜µï¼š \[\begin{equation} \left\{\begin{array}{l}{P\{I | I\}=1-q} \\ {P\{k | I\}=q / W} \\ {P\{k | I+1\}=1-p_{b}} \\ {P\{k | k\}=p_{b}} \\ {P\{I | 0\}=1}\end{array}\right. \end{equation}\] ä¸‹é¢æ±‚è§£ç¨³æ€åˆ†å¸ƒ\(b_k (k \in [0, W - 1])\)ï¼ˆIdleçŠ¶æ€çš„ç¨³æ€æ¦‚ç‡ä¸º\(b_I\)ï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡è½¬ç§»æ¦‚ç‡å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°å¦‚ä¸‹çš„æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š \[\begin{equation} b_I = \frac{1}{q}b_0 \end{equation}\] \[\begin{equation} b_{k}=\frac{(W-k) q}{W\left(1-P_{b}\right)} b_{I}=\frac{(W-k)}{W\left(1-P_{b}\right)} b_{0} \quad k \in[1, W-1] \end{equation}\] \[\begin{equation} b_{I}+b_{0}+\sum_{k=1}^{W-1} b_{k}=1 \end{equation}\] å½“backoff counterä¸º0æ—¶èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å‘å‘é€ï¼Œåˆ™\(b_0\)ä¸ºä¼ è¾“æ¦‚ç‡(transmission probability) \(\tau\)ã€‚é€šè¿‡ä¸Šé¢çš„ä¸‰ä¸ªå…¬å¼ç»„æˆçš„æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \label{tau} \tau=b_{0}=\left(\frac{1}{q}+1+\frac{(W-1)}{2\left(1-P_{b}\right)}\right)^{-1} \end{equation}\] åœ¨å¾—åˆ°ä¼ è¾“æ¦‚ç‡ä»¥åï¼Œé€šè¿‡ç»å…¸æ–‡ç« [2]æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—ååç‡æ€§èƒ½ã€‚ä¸è¿‡æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨è¿™é‡Œçš„æ¨¡å‹ä¸­å¢åŠ äº†IdleçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå› æ­¤åˆ†æä¼šæœ‰ä¸€ç‚¹ä¸åŒã€‚ è®°\(P_b\)ä¸ºä¿¡é“ç¹å¿™çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œ\(P_s\)ä¸ºä¼ è¾“æˆåŠŸçš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œåˆ™ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \label{Pb} \begin{aligned} P_{b} &=1-(1-\tau)^{n-1} \\ P_{s} &=n \tau(1-\tau)^{n-1} \end{aligned} \end{equation}\] æŒ‰ç…§[2]çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°†ä¸¤æ¬¡backoffçŠ¶æ€ä¹‹é—´çš„é—´éš”å®šä¹‰ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªslotï¼ˆvirtual slotï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™virtual slotå¯èƒ½åŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºçš„slotï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡å†²çªï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä¸€æ¬¡æˆåŠŸçš„å‘é€ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆæœ‰ï¼š \[\begin{equation} \text {SlotTime}=(1-\tau)^{n} \sigma+\left(1-(1-\tau)^{n}\right) T \end{equation}\] ç”±äºåœ¨å¹¿æ’­ä¸­ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰RTS/CTSï¼Œä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰ACKï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸€æ¬¡å†²çªå’Œä¸€æ¬¡æˆåŠŸå‘é€å ç”¨ä¿¡é“çš„æ—¶é—´æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼š \[\begin{equation} T=\frac{H+E[P]}{R}+D I F S+\delta \end{equation}\] è¿™é‡Œ\(H\)ä¸ºç‰©ç†å±‚å¸§å¤´å’ŒMACå±‚å¸§å¤´çš„å¤§å°ï¼Œ\(R\)ä¸ºå‘é€é€Ÿç‡ã€‚ç”±äºæˆ‘ä»¬å‡å®šåŒ…çš„ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹æ˜¯Poissonè¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œåˆ™ \[\begin{equation} \label{q} q=1-e^{-\lambda S l o t T i m e} \end{equation}\] é€šè¿‡è”ç«‹æ±‚è§£\(\eqref{tau}, \eqref{Pb}, \eqref{q}\)éçº¿æ€§æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°å½’ä¸€åŒ–ååç‡æ€§èƒ½ \[\begin{equation} S=\frac{P_{s} E[P]}{S l o t T i m e} \end{equation}\] ä¸Šé¢æè¿°çš„æ˜¯éé¥±å’ŒçŠ¶æ€ä¸‹çš„æ€§èƒ½è®¡ç®—è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å½“\(\lambda\)è¶‹è¿‘äºæ— ç©·å¤§ï¼Œå³\(q\)è¶‹å‘äº1æ—¶ï¼Œå³å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°é¥±å’Œåœºæ™¯ä¸‹çš„é€šä¿¡æ€§èƒ½ã€‚ Reference [1] J.-P. Wang, M. Abolhasan, D. R. Franklin, and F. Safaei, â€œCharacterising the behaviour of ieee 802.11 broadcast transmissions in ad hoc wireless lans,â€ in 2009 ieee international conference on communications, 2009, pp. 1â€“5. [2] G. Bianchi, â€œPerformance analysis of the ieee 802.11 distributed coordination function,â€ IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications, vol. 18, no. 3, pp. 535â€“547, 2000.
